title: Why do some people hate Shawn Mendes and say that he cannot sing for no reason? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m going to write this based on experience, albeit there may be other reasons. This girl in my class back In year six, wasn’t always the most mature. I’ve always been a big fan of Shawn Mendes, and this girl was practically in love with the swedish twins, Marcus and Martinus and I’m not that fond of them. It’s not because they´re not great singers — they are— I´ve just gotten really tired of hearing “Girls” 24/7 in class. One day someone casually asked who my least favorite singers were. I wasn´t so sure, and the first names that popped into my head were of course Marcus and Martinus. As soon as the words left my mouth, this girl was jumping through class, yelling, “EWW, SHAWN MENDES! EWW, SHAWN MENDES!” Like I said, she wasn´t the most mature. After that, she’d yell that, everytime I mentioned Marcus & Martinus. Of course, there are other reasons than this petty rivalry, but I thought I might as well say this. Some people just have a different music taste and other dont like his voice or songwriting.
